The purpose of this show is to show you how to survive in these certain situations, if you read the disclaimer at the beginning of each show it clearly says "Bear is presented with the situations in order to show you how to survive" it doesn't say "Bear has to sleep outside or isn't allowed a camera crew" End of the day, he's trained the best army squadron in the world to survive, and if that isn't something then what is? And if you were stranded with him, you'd all be the first to follow his lead, you hypocritical fucks, just because some guy does it with only a camera it doesn't make Bear less authentic, you should do your own research instead of just jumping on the "Bear Grylls is fake" band wagon, because it makes you sound like a retard, like the ones he always goes on about in episodes who have completely ignored safety classes, training, or just tried to go up against the weather, so please, shut the fuck up!
